item.tetra.scroll.single/more_mod_tetra_: Describes how to craft a staff for mages, though its contents suggest it can be further specialized.
tetra/schematic.single/more_mod_tetra/ir: Replaces the tool head with an arcane staff head. A fusion of smithing and magic that grants spell-related attributes and allows right-click spellcasting.
tetra.module.single/more_mod_tetra/iron_: The arcane staff head channels power from materials to grant spell attributes to the wielder.

more_mod_tetra.effect.ritual_of_holy_gua: Attacks gain 1 level of §eRitual of Holy Guard§r (max 9 levels); each level provides §e%1$s%%§r damage reduction and §ehalf that amount§r as damage bonus, with each hit reducing the effect's level by 1.

more_mod_tetra.effect.marching_time.name: Marching Moment
more_mod_tetra.effect.marching_time.tool: Continuously gains §e%1$s§r levels of §eMarching Stance§r; while active: +20%% attack power per level, -15%% damage taken per level. If killed during Marching Stance, respawns with 50%% health and gains 30s §eDestruction Stance§r, with a 60s respawn cooldown.

more_mod_tetra.effect.ruination_time.too: Continuously gains §e%1$s§r levels of §eDestruction Stance§r; while active: +10%% attack power, movement speed, and attack speed per level, and deals §estance level × 20%% of own attack power§r physical damage to surrounding 7x7 area.
